item.title: Vibe Coding a Chess UI: Building on the ESP32 with Cursor & LVGL
item.description: In this post, I share my experience using AI-driven tools like Cursor, Claude Sonnet, and OpenAI’s o3 to rapidly prototype an embedded chess UI on the ESP32 microcontroller using LVGL. Letting the AI handle implementation let me stay focused on high-level design, iterate quickly, and stay in flow. Hype aside, it’s a powerful tool for exploring ideas faster.
